net.sf.jclal.sampling

Class AbstractSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.sampling.AbstractSampling
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, ISampling, ITool, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiLabelResample, Resample, Resample

    public abstract class AbstractSampling
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISampling, IConfigure
    Abstract class for sampling, the sampling methods are used to select the initial labeled set from the training set
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
